class  com.janrain.android.engage.types.JRActivityObject
 An activity object you create, populate, and post to the user's activity stream. More...

Detailed Description

Interface for creating and populating activities that you wish to publish.

Interface for creating and populating activities that you wish to publish to your user's social networks. Create an activity object, fill in the object's fields, and pass the object to the JREngage library when you are ready to share.
